name: Berlin Vinyl
description:
Participated in the mini-jam at AMaze Fest and in 3 hours made BerlinVinyl, in which you walk on vinyl records listening to the changing music in the process. Inspired by the artwork of a local artist painting records by the metro station, their photographs became the textures of the records in the game. 

Controls: WASD to move, 0 to change a window mode.
